resources.string: Worry not! We aren\'t \'secretly\' storing all your SMS. All we do is read your SMS for the 4-8 digit, and that too only those SMS which have OTP written in them. If you\'re still unsure of your privacy having us, it\'s OK, we can part.
So you\'re worried that we\'re secretly storing all your SMS. Worry not! We shall tell you how we\'re doing things.
